_source.text: 1 Guard your steps when you go to God's house; for to draw near to listen is better than to give the sacrifice of fools, for they don't know that they do evil.

text: 1 Guard your steps when you go to God's house; for to draw near to listen **is** **better** **than** to give
the **sacrifice** of fools, for they don't know that they do **evil**.

_source.text: 1 Keep thy foot when thou goest to the house of God; for to draw nigh to hear is better than to give the sacrifice of fools: for they know not that they do evil.

text: 1 Keep thy foot when thou goest to the house of God; for to draw nigh to hear **is** **better** **than** to

_source.text: +1, as hard as it can be sometimes when you know "if I only knew the full picture I know I could help", if you have to pull teeth to get the full picture sometimes your time is better spent elsewhere -  Daniel DiPaolo Mar 11 '11 at 19:21

_source.text: 11/11/13 -- What could be better than adopting one precious little kitty?

text: **11**/**11**/13 -- What could be **better** **than** adopting one precious little kitty?

_source.text: 11.    Sanctuary/Refuge : It has been narrated that peace be upon him (the prophet) entered upon 'Othman Bin Maz'oon and read the last three Surahs of the Koran (this Surah included) and said: We seek sanctuary within these (three last Surahs of Koran) and there is no refuge better than them.

text: 11.    **Sanctuary**/Refuge : It has been narrated that peace be upon him (the **prophet**) entered upon 'Othman Bin Maz'oon and read the last three Surahs of the Koran (this Surah included) and said: We seek **sanctuary** within these (three last Surahs of Koran) and there is no refuge **better** **than** them.

_source.text: 1) The prophet may make mistakes, but the prophet is surely much more inspired than I, so I will follow him and believe what he believes because he is not only God's representative, but so doing is better than relying on my own insight.

text: 1) The **prophet** may make mistakes, but the **prophet** is surely much more inspired than I, so I will follow him and **believe** what he believes because he is not only God's representative, but so doing **is** **better** **than** relying on my own insight.
